original_title: The Wacky Adventures of Ronald McDonald: Scared Silly
overview: Ronald and his friends going on a camping trip in the Far-Flung Forest where Ronald discovers an old house which he assumes is haunted by a ghost called the Far-Flung Phantom. The campers are forced to stay in the old house due to the stormy weather where a holographic head named Franklin leads them through a challenging game which will eventually help them to escape.
title: The Wacky Adventures of Ronald McDonald: Scared Silly
